termofuse.description: By using Oocidia's website or services, you confirm that you are at least 18 years old or have received permission from a legal guardian. Continued use constitutes agreement to these Terms of Use.

You agree to use Oocidia's services for lawful purposes only. You must not: Engage in activities that violate any applicable laws or regulations, Use our services to distribute harmful, offensive, or unauthorized content, Attempt to disrupt the functionality of the website or its related services.

All content on the Oocidia website, including text, graphics, logos, and trademarks, is the property of Oocidia or its licensors. You may not copy, modify, distribute, or reproduce any materials without prior written consent

If you create an account, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials. Oocidia is not liable for unauthorized access or activity on your account due to negligence.
Oocidia reserves the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any product or service without prior notice. Prices and availability are subject to change
Oocidia is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services, including but not limited to loss of data, revenue, or profits.

Your use of our services is subject to our Privacy Policy, which explains how we collect, use, and protect your data. By using our services, you consent to the collection and use of your information as outlined in the Privacy Policy.
Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services. Oocidia is not responsible for the content, policies, or practices of these external sites. Accessing them is at your own risk.
Oocidia reserves the right to terminate or restrict your access to our services at any time, with or without notice, for any violation of these Terms of Use or for other lawful reasons.
These Terms of Use are governed by the laws of Singapore. Any disputes arising under or in connection with these terms shall be resolved exclusively in the courts of Singapore.

Oocidia may update these Terms of Use periodically. The revised terms will be posted on our website with the updated effective date. Continued use of the services after such updates constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.
